${modID}:SoloSpam.NAME: Solo Spam
${modID}:SoloSpam.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL At the end of your turn, lowers its cost by !M! and shuffles a copy into your draw pile.

${modID}:Om.NAME: Om
${modID}:Om.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL While in hand, whenever you take unblocked damage, shuffle a copy into your draw pile.

${modID}:Scam.NAME: Scam!
${modID}:Scam.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, set a random card's cost to !M! for the rest of combat.

${modID}:DeezNuts.NAME: Deez Nuts
${modID}:DeezNuts.DESCRIPTION: Disguises itself as a card in your deck. NL When played, lose !M! hp and fill your hand with *Gottem.

${modID}:Gottem.NAME: Gottem
${modID}:Gottem.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! hp.

${modID}:First.NAME: First!
${modID}:First.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Unplayable. Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn place a *Second! on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Second.NAME: Second!
${modID}:Second.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn place a *Third! on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Like.NAME: Like
${modID}:Like.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, add a *Subscribe to your hand.

${modID}:Subscribe.NAME: Subscribe
${modID}:Subscribe.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL When retained, lower its cost by !M! and shuffle a *New *Video into your draw pile.

${modID}:Clickbait.NAME: Clickbait
${modID}:Clickbait.DESCRIPTION: If removed or transformed, lose !${modID}:m2! hp. NL When played, reduce this hp loss by !M!.

${modID}:YoutubesBlessing.NAME: Youtube's Blessing
${modID}:YoutubesBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Unremovable. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Transforms into Youtube's Revenge in act 4.

${modID}:YoutubesRevenge.NAME: Youtube's Revenge
${modID}:YoutubesRevenge.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Unremovable. NL Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When drawn, ALL enemies gain !M! Strength.
